name: Cinnamon Stick Soy Candle 8oz Travel Tin
description:
Cinnamon Stick:

"This candle is a rich spicy cinnamon scent."

Burn time- 40-80 hours.

**************************************************
Wax Color: Red/Burgundy
**************************************************
My candles are always hand made with soy wax from USA grown soy, a lead-free cotton soy primed wick, BPA free scent and an earth friendly coloring.

Why choose soy candles?
Soy candles have a longer burn time and are better for you than other petroleum based candles. Soy is a renewable resource. Soy holds scent better and have a better scent throw.

You may notice your candle gets a "blooming" or frosting of the wax which is very typical of pure soy candles and it does not affect the burn or quality of your candle at all!

Orange County Candles are hand poured in the heart of historic Orange County, Virginia
